thread.section_title: Remitly | Send Money Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Remitly | Send Money Home | remitly.com
thread.title: Lovelyn Morgan
thread.title_full: Remitly | Send Money Home reviewed by Lovelyn Morgan

author: Lovelyn Morgan
title: Lovelyn Morgan
text: The service fee is less compared to other remittance company to the Philippines. Its fast and my remittance received by my family quickly more than expected. They text my brother and myself to inform money is ready to pick up. They keep you updated of the status until pick up by receiver. I'm very happy with this company and highly recommend this company to my fellow kababayan. I will use this company sending money to my family in the Philippines from now on. Thank you so much Remitly. Keep up the good works!
